attributes.action: Introduce a drinking license , that no unlicensed person may consume alcohol
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A licensing system to regulate drinking will have an effect on underage alcohol consumption and must be considered before raising the "price per unit" which will have a negative effect on publicans and further cripple the pub trade.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
